en: Basic defence program that protects the local node.
Basic offence program that attacks all neighboring nodes.
Attack a random hostile node as long as there is one available.
Offence program that attacks all neighboring nodes.
Defensive program that protects it's node while hostile nodes are adjacent.
Only activate the defence while hostile programs are nearby.
Perform defensive operations while engaged, attack a random node otherwise.
Hold node if needed, then defend if a hostile program is nearby, else attack.
Attacks random hostile nodes and makes copies of itself.
Attacks all neighboring nodes and move to another node if no valid targets nearby.
Attack a random hostile node as long as there is one available.
